author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Axis Capital Says Realignment Of Accident & Health Business Into Insurance And Reinsurance Segments Took Place In Q1
text:
April 11 (Reuters) - AXIS Capital Holdings Ltd:
* AXIS CAPITAL PROVIDES SUPPLEMENTAL FINANCIAL INFORMATION RELATED TO THE REALIGNMENT OF ITS ACCIDENT & HEALTH BUSINESS
* AXIS CAPITAL HOLDINGS LTD - REALIGNMENT OF CO’S ACCIDENT & HEALTH BUSINESS INTO COMPANY’S INSURANCE AND REINSURANCE SEGMENTS TOOK PLACE IN Q1 OF 2018
* AXIS CAPITAL HOLDINGS - EFFECTIVE JANUARY 1, ACCIDENT & HEALTH RESULTS WILL BE INCLUDED IN RESULTS OF BOTH INSURANCE AND REINSURANCE SEGMENTS OF CO Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
